name: DotNetCoreInstaller
description: Acquire a specific version of the .NET Core SDK from the internet or local cache and add it to the PATH
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: packageType
inputs.label: Package to install
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please select whether to install only runtime or full SDK.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify exact version of .NET Core SDK or runtime to install.
Find the value of `version-sdk` for installing SDK, or `version-runtime` for installing Runtime from any releases [here](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/releases.json)
